title: Arrange for a Press Pass
description: A reporter needs a press pass to gain access to a secure event, like a political convention.

tasks.description: Find the official media credential application form on the event organizer's website.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the correct application form.

tasks.description: Fill out the application with the reporter's details and the publication's information.
tasks.expected_outcome: The application is filled out accurately.

tasks.description: Submit the application and any required supporting documents (e.g., a letter from the editor).
tasks.expected_outcome: The credential application is successfully submitted.
